name: Let Sleeping Princesses Lie
description:
A light-hearted but twisty take on classic fairytales. 

When a king makes a wish for a child, the wish comes true. But you know what they say about wishes...

Your choices matter. Or do they?

This is a demo game by Cloud Atelier, a new visual novel group made by dreamers. Music by Wolfman Sachs on Youtube.
